#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is a must-have for any fan of the Warhammer 40,000 universe, and it plays well on the Steam Deck
- **Performance:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Battery:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
